+ * specific language governing permissions and limitations
+ * under the License.
+ */
+
+package org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.validators.scope;
+
+import org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.IdentityOAuth2Exception;
+import org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.authz.OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext;
+import org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.model.AccessTokenDO;
+import org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.OAuthTokenReqMessageContext;
+import org.wso2.carbon.user.api.UserStoreException;
+
+/**
+ * This is a global level interface for scope validation. This needs to be engaged after application level validators.
+ */
+public interface ScopeValidator {
+
+    /**
+     * Checks whether the validator can be engaged.
+     *
+     * @return True if it can handle, otherwise false.
+     */
+    boolean canHandle();
+
+    /**
+     * Validates scopes in the authorization  request and manipulate the permitted scopes within the request.
+     *
+     * @param authzReqMessageContext Authorization request.
+     * @return True if the user has enough permission to generate tokens or authorization codes with requested
+     * scopes or no scopes are requested, otherwise false.
+     * @throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
+     */
+    boolean validateScope(OAuthAuthzReqMessageContext authzReqMessageContext) throws UserStoreException,
+            IdentityOAuth2Exception;
+
+    /**
+     * Validates scopes in the token request and manipulate the permitted scopes within the request.
+     *
+     * @param tokReqMsgCtx OAuthTokenReqMessageContext.
+     * @return True if the user has enough permission to generate tokens with requested scopes or
+     * no scopes are requested, otherwise false.
+     * @throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
+     */
+    boolean validateScope(OAuthTokenReqMessageContext tokReqMsgCtx) throws IdentityOAuth2Exception,
+            UserStoreException;
+
+    /**
+     * Validates scopes in the token validation request and manipulate the permitted scopes within the request.
+     *
+     * @param accessTokenDO AccessTokenDO.
+     * @return True if the user has enough permission to access the resource with requested scopes or no scopes are
+     * requested, otherwise false.
+     * @throws IdentityOAuth2Exception
+     */
+    boolean validateScope(AccessTokenDO accessTokenDO) throws IdentityOAuth2Exception;
